about_the_game:
Game Overview

A fast-paced action score attack game with MOBA-style controls!
Dodge enemy attacks with precise movements and unleash powerful skills to defeat them.
Challenge yourself in high-difficulty score attacks and push your limits to achieve the highest score!

Gameplay

The player controls a character from a top-down perspective, eliminating enemies and earning points.
Maintaining a combo by continuously defeating enemies increases the score multiplier.
Strategically combining skills and analyzing enemy movement patterns is the key to success.

How to Earn High Scores

  • Maintain Your Combo: Defeating enemies in succession increases your combo count. For every 10 combos, your score multiplier increases by 1.1x.

    • Example: 50 combos → 1.5x multiplier, 120 combos → 2.2x multiplier

  • Utilize Skills Effectively: Some skills help you build combos faster, making skill synergy essential!

  • Avoid Taking Damage: Getting hit by enemies resets your combo. Use movement and positioning to stay unharmed.

Controls

Movement & Camera Controls

  • Right Click: Move the player character

  • Move the mouse to the screen edge: Shift the camera

  • Hold Space Key: Locks the camera to follow the character

Skill Actions

  • Q Key: Fires an attack skill. Cooldown resets after moving a short distance

  • W Key: Marks an enemy and resets the cooldown of the E skill

    • If the marked enemy is defeated 1 second after marking, W's cooldown resets

  • E Key: Short-range blink (teleport)

  • R Key: Powerful ultimate attack that pierces through enemies

Unique Mechanics

  • Skill cooldowns are not time-based; they reset based on the distance the player moves

  • Predict enemy movement and time your skills for maximum efficiency

  • Maintain your combo and maximize your score for a fast-paced and rewarding experience

Who Will Enjoy This Game?

  • Players familiar with MOBA or action game controls

  • Fans of fast-paced combat that requires quick reflexes

  • Those who enjoy chasing high scores and mastering game mechanics through repeated play
